comments.body: I have a real dislike for one character variables (even if they are local) because they make it harder to read your code. This could have been **org** instead of **o**.

Not a big issue now, but something to think of in the future.
Readability is one of the highest goods in community collaboration.
I get it. I got into that habit when I learned C/C++ back in the day as `i` was most often used in a `while` loop. Blame public schools.
